Registry operations¶

The registry holds information about available producers and consumers.

Registry¶

class rgma.Registry(vdbName)¶

A registry provides information about available producers.

Parameter:vdbName (string) – name of VDB
getAllProducersForTable(tableName)¶

Returns a list of all producers for a table with their registered information.

Parameter:name (string) – name of table
Returns:a list of ProducerTableEntry objects, one for each producer

ProducerTableEntry¶

class rgma.ProducerTableEntry(endpoint, secondary, continuous, static, history, latest, predicate, hrpSec)¶
getEndpoint()¶

Returns the producer’s endpoint.

return: rgma.ResourceEndpoint

getPredicate()¶

Return the predicate.

Returns:string
getRetentionPeriod()¶

Returns the producer’s history retention period.

Returns:rgma.TimeInterval
isContinuous()¶

Does the producer support continuous queries?

Returns:boolean True if producer supports continuous queries
isHistory()¶

Does the producer support history queries?

Returns:boolean True if producer supports history queries
isLatest()¶

Does the producer support latest queries?

Returns:boolean True if producer supports latest queries
isSecondary()¶

Is the producer a secondary producer?

Returns:boolean True if producer is secondary
isStatic()¶

Does the producer support static queries?

Returns:boolean True if producer supports static queries
